column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I went on a Thursday evening just ahead of the crowd
column2: and it did get crowded.  First
column3: the side salad I ordered was huge.  It was a meal unto itself.  I really had to work to finish it before the pizza came.  All the greens were very fresh and crisp and the ranch dressing was good.  The only complaint
column4: if you can call it that
column5: was that the salad was so big it barely fit on the plate.  In fact
column6: I couldn't take a bite without salad falling all over the table.  But on to more important things....
